title: Are ‘Blood Type Diets’ Actually Rooted In Any Science?
subtitle: There is a lot of speculative science from the man who invented the diet, but actual evidence in support of the diet’s efficacy is severely lacking.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Diets tailored to one’s specific blood type are capable of reducing myriad ailments, improving digestion, enabling weight loss, and providing increased energy.
